            Tridge operates an online platform that facilitates effective and efficient communication between buyers and suppliers. As a growth hacker at Tridge, you will develop, implement, track and optimize our digital marketing efforts across various channels. The right candidate will be proficient in developing effective online marketing strategies for suppliers and buyers of various industries in the global market.

            RESPONSIBILITIESWe are looking for a passionate individual who is eager to learn fast and enthusiastic about solving challenging business problems. As a member of Growth / Marketing Division of Tridge, you will:- Conduct data analysis to identify target stakeholders and marketing channels- Execute marketing strategies for recruiting Tridge’s local agents, suppliers and buyers- Initiate partnership opportunities with manufacturers & suppliers - Execute buyer communications and digital marketing campaigns - Support communication with Tridge users and engage them in the everyday operationsQUALIFICATIONSRequired: - Graduated with a Bachelor’s degree or is currently on his/her last year - Welcome both fresh graduate and experienced (3~7 years experience) Preferred: - Commodity trading, corporate b2b sales or cross-border purchasing experience - Proactive, hard-working and has a sense of responsibility to accomplish assigned tasks - “Go-getter” personality - Strategic and logical thinking capability - Excellent verbal and written communication skills - High interest on global trade and market trends HOW TO APPLY- Required documents: Resume in English (including contact information)- Please e-mail the required documents at recruit@tridge.com.- Qualified candidates for an interview will be contacted individually.
